item.title: Just-in-time access to groups and Conditional Access integration in Privileged Identity Management
item.description:
As part of our mission to enable customers to manage access with least privilege, we’re excited to announce the general availability of two additions to Microsoft Entra Privileged Identity Management (PIM): PIM for Groups and PIM integration with Conditional Access.
Just-in-time access to privileged roles with PIM for groups
Part of Microsoft Entra ID Governance and Microsoft Entra ID P2, PIM enables you to manage just-in-time access to privileged roles in Microsoft Entra, Microsoft 365 services, and Azure. With the new just-in-time group membership capability, you can now further simplify...
